B

Barge - Class in ships
The barge is a slower ship, but makes up for it with its cargo capacity
Barge() - Constructor for class ships.Barge
 
bargeBtn - Variable in class gui.GameSetup
 
baseValue - Variable in class items.Item
 
buyButtons - Variable in class gui.SaleScreen
 
buyButtons - Variable in class gui.UpgradeSale
 
buyItem(Item, int) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Adds an item to the player cargo hold and keeps track of it in the ledger
buyItem(TradeGood) - Method in class islands.Store
Takes an item (usually an "unbought" item from a store), and fills out all the fields about where/how much it was bought for
